title: Zootopia is a perfect metaphor for India today
selftext:
Watched it today with my kid. The movie has so many metaphors. The deputy mayor who plays on the majority’s fears of the minority to stay in power.

Should be a must watch for everyone in India
comments: It was created with American racial biases in mind, so yeah, it tracks.
